title: ECHS Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for 06 Medical Officer, Lab Tech and Other Posts
description: The Ex-Servicemen Contributory Health Scheme (ECHS) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 06  Medical Officers, Lab Technician, Pharmacist, Dental Hygienist, Peon, and Safaiwala Jobs. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their MBBS, BDS, B. Pharm, D. Pharm, 10th, 12th, and 08th can apply for the ECHS Recruitment 2025. The interested applicants can appl...
